step_8_analysis.justification: The interviewer asked four questions directly related to user research methods, including specific follow-ups on analysis, synthesis, and usability testing. The depth of discussion was intermediate, with applied usage and examples provided by the candidate. This supports the rejection reason of a weak understanding of user research methods.
step_8_analysis.rejection_reason: weak understanding of user research methods

step_8_analysis.justification: L2 mentioned 'usability principles', but the L1 interview did not include any questions evaluating this topic.
